CustomField.formula:
IF(RecordTypeId = "0125Y000001RfwH", IF(Start_Date__c > TODAY(), "Not Started", IF(End_Date__c > TODAY()-1 && Hours_Remaining_Formula__c > 0 || Roll_Over_Hours_Expiration__c > TODAY()-1 && End_Date__c < TODAY()-1 && Hours_Remaining_Formula__c > 0 , "Active", "Completed" ) ) ,"" ) /*
If the Record Type is Navigator, then:
If the Start Date is after today show "Not Started",
OTHERWISE (if the Start Date is not after today) if the End Date is after today and there are hours remaining OR if the Roll Over Hours Expiration date is after today and the end date is before today and there are hours remaining, show "Active",
OTHERWISE (if it's not an "Active" thing) show "Completed"
OTHERWISE (if the Record Type is not Navigator) show ""
*/
CustomField.label: Status
